# Prep

```{r}
rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "seurat_orig.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  seurat_orig <- readRDS(rds)
} else {

  file_list <- list.files(file.path(cache_dir, "..", ".."), recursive = TRUE)
  file_list <- file_list[grep("seurat_prep.rds", file_list)]
  files <- vector("list", length(file_list))
  for (i in seq_along(files)) {
    files[[i]] <- readRDS(file.path(cache_dir, "..", "..", file_list[i]))
    files[[i]][["RNA"]] <- NULL
    files[[i]]@meta.data[grep("SCT", colnames(files[[i]]@meta.data))] <- NULL
  }

  gc()
  seurat_orig <- merge(
    files[[1]], c(files[[2]], files[[3]], files[[4]],
    files[[5]], files[[6]], files[[7]], files[[8]],
    files[[9]], files[[10]], files[[11]], files[[12]],
    files[[13]], files[[14]], files[[15]], files[[16]],
    files[[17]], files[[18]], files[[19]], files[[20]],
    files[[21]], files[[22]], files[[23]], files[[24]]
    )
  )
  rm(files)
  gc()

  seurat_anno <- readRDS(
    file.path(cache_dir, "..", "step02", "annotated_seurat.rds")
  )
  seurat_orig[["RNA"]] <- CreateAssay5Object(
    GetAssayData(seurat_anno, assay = "RNA")
  )
  seurat_orig@meta.data <- seurat_anno[[]]
  seurat_orig[["pca"]] <- seurat_anno[["pca"]]
  seurat_orig[["umap"]] <- seurat_anno[["umap"]]
  seurat_orig@misc <- seurat_anno@misc
  seurat_orig@active.ident <- seurat_orig$level2_subclusters

  rm(seurat_anno)
  gc()
  saveRDS(seurat_orig, file = rds)
}
seurat_orig

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_gene_sets_mmusculus.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {

  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(
      "..", "..", "data",
      "gprofiler_mmusculus_ENSG_2024_06_15", "mmusculus.GO.comb.ENSG.gmt"
    )
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, min.sz = 2)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

  remove <- unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets)))[
    unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))) %notin% rownames(seurat_orig)
  ]
  remove <- which(
    sapply(geneIds(gene_sets), FUN = function(x) any(x %in% remove))
  )
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]

  for (i in seq_along(gene_sets@.Data)) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }

  gene_sets_keep <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(
    gene_sets, uniqGenes = unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets)))
  )
  gene_sets_keep <- rowSums(gene_sets_keep)
  gene_sets_keep <- gene_sets_keep[order(gene_sets_keep, decreasing = TRUE)]
  gene_sets_keep <- gene_sets[match(names(gene_sets_keep), names(gene_sets))]

  dup <- sapply(
    geneIds(gene_sets_keep), FUN = function(x) paste(sort(x), collapse = "-")
  )
  dup <- which(duplicated(dup))
  gene_sets <- gene_sets_keep[-dup]

  saveRDS(gene_sets, file = rds)
}
gene_sets

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "gene_sets_keep.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets_keep <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, min.sz = 2, max.sz = 30)
  gene_sets_keep <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

  remove <- grep("^regulation", names(gene_sets_keep))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets_keep <- gene_sets_keep[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("^negative regulation", names(gene_sets_keep))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets_keep <- gene_sets_keep[-remove]
  }

  mart <- useEnsembl("ensembl", "mmusculus_gene_ensembl")
  attributes <- c("ensembl_gene_id", "chromosome_name")
  gene_anno <- getBM(
    attributes, filters = "ensembl_gene_id",
    values = unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_keep))), mart = mart
  )
  remove <- gene_anno[
    gene_anno$chromosome_name == "Y" |
      gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id == "ENSMUSG00000086503",
  ]$ensembl_gene_id
  remove <- which(
    sapply(geneIds(gene_sets_keep), FUN = function(x) any(x %in% remove))
  )
  gene_sets_keep <- gene_sets_keep[-remove]

  gene_sets_keep <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(
    gene_sets_keep, uniqGenes = unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_keep)))
  )
  gene_sets_keep[upper.tri(gene_sets_keep)] <- 0
  diag(gene_sets_keep) <- 0
  gene_sets_keep <- apply(gene_sets_keep, MARGIN = 1, FUN = max)
  gene_sets_keep <- gene_sets_keep[gene_sets_keep < 0.7]

  saveRDS(gene_sets_keep, file = rds)
}
gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(gene_sets_keep)]

gene_anno <- data.frame(
  symbol = unlist(seurat_orig@misc), ensembl = rownames(seurat_orig[["RNA"]])
)

ctypes <- vector("list", length = 7)
ctypes <- list(
  Astrocyte = c(
    "Astrocyte 01", "Astrocyte 02", "Astrocyte 03",
    "Astro Homeostatic 01", "Astro DAA 01"
  ),
  Oligodendrocyte = c(
    "Oligodendrocyte 01", "Oligodendrocyte 02", "Oligodendrocyte 03",
    "Oligodendrocyte 04", "Oligodendrocyte 05",
    "Oligo Homeostatic 01", "Oligo DAO 01"
  ),
  Microglia = c(
    "Microglia 01", "Microglia 02", "Micro Homeostatic 01",
    "Micro DAM 01", "Micro DAM 02"
  ),
  CA3 = c("Glut CA3 01", "Glut CA3 02", "Glut CA3 03"),
  CA1 = c("Glut CA1 01"),
  ENT = c("Glut L2 ENT 01", "Glut L3 ENT 01"),
  GABAergic = c("GABA Sst 01")
)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "seurat_list.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  rm(seurat_orig)
  gc()
  seurat_list <- readRDS(rds)
} else {

  seurat_list <- vector("list", length = 7)
  for (i in seq_along(ctypes)) {

    seurat <- subset(seurat_orig, idents = ctypes[[i]])
    seurat <- PrepSCTFindMarkers(seurat, verbose = FALSE)

    counts_mat <- GetAssayData(seurat)
    counts_mat[is.na(counts_mat)] <- 0
    seurat <- SetAssayData(seurat, new.data = counts_mat)
    counts_mat <- GetAssayData(seurat, slot = "counts")
    counts_mat[is.na(counts_mat)] <- 0
    seurat <- SetAssayData(seurat, slot = "counts", new.data = counts_mat)

    seurat$nCount_SCT <- colSums(seurat, layer = "counts")
    seurat$nFeature_SCT <- colSums(counts_mat > 0)

    seurat$genotype <- factor(
      seurat$genotype,
      levels = c(
        "MAPTKI", "S305N", "P301S", "NLGF_MAPTKI", "NLGF_S305N", "NLGF_P301S"
      )
    )
    seurat$genotype_batch <- factor(
      seurat$genotype_batch,
      levels = paste(
        rep(levels(seurat$genotype), each = 4),
        paste0("batch0", seq(4)), sep = "_"
      )
    )
    seurat$broad_annotations <- factor(seurat$broad_annotations)
    seurat$level1_subclusters <- factor(seurat$level1_subclusters)
    seurat$level2_subclusters <- factor(seurat$level2_subclusters)
    seurat@active.ident <- seurat$genotype_batch

    seurat$tau <- factor(
      gsub("NLGF_", replacement = "", x = seurat$genotype),
      levels = c("MAPTKI", "S305N", "P301S")
    )
    seurat$amyloid <- factor(
      ifelse(grepl("NLGF", x = seurat$genotype), yes = "NLGF", no = "WT"),
      levels = c("WT", "NLGF")
    )

    gc()
    DefaultAssay(seurat) <- "RNA"
    scores <- calculateScores(
      GetAssayData(seurat, layer = "counts"), rownames(seurat),
      geneIds(gene_sets)
    )
    gc()
    rownames(scores) <- names(gene_sets)
    colnames(scores) <- colnames(seurat)

    seurat[["GF"]] <- CreateAssay5Object(scores, data = log1p(scores))
    DefaultAssay(seurat) <- "GF"
    seurat$nCount_GF <- colSums(seurat, layer = "counts")
    seurat$nFeature_GF <- colSums(
      GetAssayData(seurat, layer = "counts") > 0
    )

    gc()
    DefaultAssay(seurat) <- "SCT"
    scores <- calculateScores(
      GetAssayData(seurat, layer = "counts"), rownames(seurat),
      geneIds(gene_sets)
    )
    gc()
    rownames(scores) <- names(gene_sets)
    colnames(scores) <- colnames(seurat)
    saveRDS(scores, file = rds)

    seurat[["GF_SCT"]] <- CreateAssay5Object(scores, data = log1p(scores))
    DefaultAssay(seurat) <- "GF_SCT"
    seurat$nCount_GF_SCT <- colSums(seurat, layer = "counts")
    seurat$nFeature_GF_SCT <- colSums(
      GetAssayData(seurat, layer = "counts") > 0
    )

    seurat_list[[i]] <- seurat
  }
  rm(seurat_orig, seurat, scores)
  gc()
  saveRDS(seurat_list, file = rds)
}
seurat_list

gse_list <- vector("list", length = 7)
deg_list <- vector("list", length = 7)

for (i in seq_along(seurat_list)) {

  seurat_sub <- seurat_list[[i]]
  seurat_sub@active.ident <- seurat_sub$genotype
  seurat_sub <- subset(
    seurat_sub, downsample = min(table(seurat_sub$genotype))
  )

  gse <- as.SingleCellExperiment(seurat_list[[i]], assay = "GF")
  keep <- filterByExpr(
    GetAssayData(seurat_sub, assay = "GF", layer = "counts"),
    group = seurat_sub$genotype,
    min.prop = 0.1,
    min.count = 1,
    min.total.count = 1.5,
    large.n = 0
  )
  gse <- gse[keep, ]
  gse <- suppressWarnings(
    aggregateAcrossCells(
      gse, colData(gse)[ , "genotype_batch"],
      use_exprs_values = "counts", statistics = "sum"
    )
  )

  deg <- as.SingleCellExperiment(seurat_list[[i]], assay = "RNA")
  keep <- filterByExpr(
    GetAssayData(seurat_sub, assay = "RNA", layer = "counts"),
    group = seurat_sub$genotype,
    min.prop = 0.1,
    min.count = 1,
    min.total.count = 1.5,
    large.n = 0
  )
  deg <- deg[keep, ]
  deg <- suppressWarnings(
    aggregateAcrossCells(
      deg, colData(deg)[ , "genotype_batch"],
      use_exprs_values = "counts", statistics = "sum"
    )
  )

  dge <- DGEList(counts(gse))
  keep <- filterByExpr(
    dge, group = gse$genotype,
    min.count = 10, min.total.count = 15
  )
  dge <- dge[keep, ]
  dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
  keep <- filterByExpr(
    dge, group = gse$genotype,
    min.count = 10, min.total.count = 15
  )
  dge <- dge[keep, , keep.lib.sizes = FALSE]

  gse <- gse[rownames(gse) %in% rownames(dge)]
  logcounts(gse, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(
    dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 2
  )

  gse <- gse[rownames(gse) %in% names(gene_sets_keep), ]

  dge <- DGEList(counts(deg))
  keep <- filterByExpr(
    dge, group = deg$genotype,
    min.count = 10, min.total.count = 15
  )
  dge <- dge[keep, ]
  dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
  keep <- filterByExpr(
    dge, group = gse$genotype,
    min.count = 10, min.total.count = 15
  )
  dge <- dge[keep, , keep.lib.sizes = FALSE]

  deg <- deg[rownames(deg) %in% rownames(dge)]
  logcounts(deg, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(
    dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 2
  )

  gene_sets_sub <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% rownames(gse)]
  deg <- deg[rownames(deg) %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sub))), ]

  design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
  colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
  cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
    S305N_MAPTKI =
      gse.genotypeS305N -
      gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
    P301S_MAPTKI =
      gse.genotypeP301S -
      gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
    NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
      gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
      gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
    NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
      gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
      gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
    NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
      gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
      gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
    levels = design
  )

  fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
  fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
  fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

  tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
  write.fit(
    fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
    adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
  )
  gse_list[[i]] <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))

  fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
  fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
  fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

  tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
  write.fit(
    fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
    adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
  )
  deg_list[[i]] <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
}

results <- rbind(
  gse_list[[1]], deg_list[[1]], gse_list[[2]], deg_list[[2]],
  gse_list[[3]], deg_list[[3]], gse_list[[4]], deg_list[[4]],
  gse_list[[5]], deg_list[[5]], gse_list[[6]], deg_list[[6]],
  gse_list[[7]], deg_list[[7]]
)

corrections <- c(
  results[ , 13], results[ , 14], results[ , 15],
  results[ , 16], results[ , 17]
)
corrections <- data.frame(mean = rep(results[ , 2], times = 5), p = corrections)
corrections <- ihw(p ~ mean,  data = corrections, alpha = 0.05)
corrections <- adj_pvalues(corrections)
corrections <- split(
  corrections,
  f = gl(5, k = length(corrections) / 5, length = length(corrections))
)
```

```{r}
)
```

```{r}
  S305N_MAPTKI =

    gse.genotypeP301S -

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)

cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

## GSE

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r}
ctype_idx <- 7
seurat_sub <- seurat_list[[ctype_idx]]
min <- min(table(seurat_sub$genotype))
seurat_sub@active.ident <- seurat_sub$genotype
seurat_sub <- subset(seurat_sub, downsample = min)
min

gse <- as.SingleCellExperiment(seurat_list[[ctype_idx]], assay = "GF")
keep <- filterByExpr(
  GetAssayData(seurat_sub, assay = "GF", layer = "counts"),
  group = seurat_sub$genotype,
  min.prop = 0.1,
  min.count = 1,
  min.total.count = 1.5,
  large.n = 0
)
gse <- gse[keep, ]
gse <- suppressWarnings(
  aggregateAcrossCells(
    gse, colData(gse)[ , "genotype_batch"],
    use_exprs_values = "counts", statistics = "sum"
  )
)

dge <- DGEList(counts(gse))
keep <- filterByExpr(
  dge, group = gse$genotype,
  min.count = 10, min.total.count = 15
)
dge <- dge[keep, ]
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
keep <- filterByExpr(
  dge, group = gse$genotype,
  min.count = 10, min.total.count = 15
)
dge <- dge[keep, , keep.lib.sizes = FALSE]

gse <- gse[rownames(gse) %in% rownames(dge)]
logcounts(gse, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(
  dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 2
)

gse <- gse[rownames(gse) %in% names(gene_sets_keep), ]
gse_corrected <- removeBatchEffect(
  logcounts(gse), batch = gse$batch, group = gse$genotype
)
```
